text_en: A fossil of a Pokémon that lived in prehistoric times
+10 AP
+15 PP
+10 SPEED
+10% CRIT_CHANCE
+15 HP
+3 SPE_DEF
+3 ATK
+3 DEF
The holder gains the FOSSIL type
The holder gains the PSYCHIC type
The holder gains the WATER type
The holder gains the ELECTRIC type
The holder gains the FIRE type
The holder gains the FAIRY type
The holder gains the DARK type
The holder gains the GRASS type
The holder gains the ICE type
The holder gains 100 bonus AP
During combat, the holder gains 5 AP and 5 PP every second
Attacks grant +5 SPEED (stackable)
The holder's ability can now critically strike based on CRIT_CHANCE. If the ability can already critically strike by default, increase CRIT_POWER by 50% instead.
When the holder deals SPECIAL, they BURN the target for 3 seconds
The amount of SPECIAL blocked by SPE_DEF is inflicted back to the attacker
Holder heals for 33% of all damages inflicted
Holder is immune to any BOARD_EFFECT and forced displacement
The holder regains 20% of its max PP after casting its ability, + 2 PP for each cast done in the fight
Every 3 attacks, unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to the 2 closest enemies, dealing 10 SPECIAL and burning 15 PP
Critical attacks steal 10 PP from the target.
After casting ability, gain 50% of max PP as SHIELD
Holder and ADJACENT allies regain 3% of their max HP every second. 30% of overheal is converted to PP.
The holder attacks restore 5 additional PP. If the attack knocks out the target, restore 15 additional PP.
Once below 40% max HP, drop the smoke ball, gain 70 SHIELD and jump to a tile away. Every ADJACENT enemy is PARALYSIS and BLINDED for 4 seconds.
+50 SPEED. The holder attacks can no longer miss.
+100% CRIT_POWER. Critical attacks apply ARMOR_BREAK for 2 seconds.
Holder deals double damage against units with  SHIELD, and is protected from recoil damage and retaliation effects.
Attacks have [50,LK]% chance to also hit the lowest health enemy ADJACENT to target for 75% of the damage, which also trigger on-hit effects.
Attacks deal 8 % of target max HP as additional PHYSICAL on hit
When the holder takes damage, gain 1 stack. Every 2 stacks, the holder gains +2 DEF, +1 ATK and +5 SPEED (max 20 stacks)
At the beginning of each battle, WONDER_BOX is replaced by 2 temporary random craftable items (max 3 items held)
When combat begins, the holder and allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW receive 20% of their max HP as SHIELD and RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
When struck by an attack at melee range, deal 3 + 15% of DEF as retaliation TRUE to the attacker, with [30,LK]% chance to inflict WOUND for 3 seconds.
The holder gains +2 RANGE
The holder gains +50% CRIT_CHANCE
Holder is immune to all negative status effects and to sandstorm damage
+100 HP. 20% of max HP are gained as SHIELD when combat begins.
Prevents damage and give PROTECT for 1.5 seconds and 50 PP the first time the holder gets below 30% HP
When combat begins, the holder and allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW gain +20 SPEED
Holder suffers from BURN during the entire fight but increases its base ATK by 100%.
+40 SPE_DEF. Reduce BURN and POISONNED damage by 50%
Reduce all incoming PHYSICAL and SPECIAL by 30%. Makes the holder more likely to be targeted.
25% of attack damage is dealt as TRUE
Give RESURRECTION, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max HP
+25 DEF. Negates critical bonus damage from all incoming critical hits.
Consumed once below 50% HP, restore 50% HP and get CONFUSION for 3 seconds
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 20 SPE_DEF
Consumed once below 50% HP or after being FREEZE, heal 50 HP and give +15 SPEED and immunity to FREEZE for the rest of the fight
Consumed once below 50% HP or after receiving a critical hit, heal 50 HP and gain PROTECT for 2 seconds
Consumed once below 50% HP or after being PARALYSIS, heal 50 HP and give +10 ATK and immunity to PARALYSIS for the rest of the fight
Consumed once below 50% HP or after being SLEEP, heal 50 HP and give +50 AP and immunity to SLEEP for the rest of the fight
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 20 DEF
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and cast $t(ability.SPIKY_SHIELD) for 10 seconds
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 50% CRIT_CHANCE
Consumed once below 50% HP or after casting ability, heal 50 HP and gain 50 PP
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 15 ATK
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP, clear negative status and get RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 80 SHIELD
Consumed once below 50% HP or after being POISONNED, heal 100 HP and give immunity to POISONNED for the rest of the fight
Consumed once below 50% HP or after being CONFUSION, heal 50 HP and give 10 SPE_DEF and immunity to CONFUSION for the rest of the fight
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 80 AP
Consumed once below 50% HP or after being BURN, heal 50 HP and give 10 DEF and immunity to BURN for the rest of the fight
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and cast $t(ability.MAGIC_BOUNCE) for 10 seconds
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 50 SPEED
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 100 HP and increase all healing received by 30%
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50% of max HP and player gains 3 random SWEETS.
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50% of max HP and player gains 6 free shop rerolls.
Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50% of max HP and player gains 5 GOLD.
Wears $t(pkm.COMFEY) and get its ability and its max HP, ATK, DEF, and SPE_DEF as bonus stats.
Gives ELECTRIC synergy. Every third attack inflicts PARALYSIS for 2 seconds.
Gives FIRE synergy. The holder doesn't take BURN damage. Instead, it gains 30 SPEED when burning.
Gives FIGHTING synergy.
Gives LIGHT synergy.
Gives DRAGON synergy as first synergy.
Gives SOUND synergy. Every second, the holder gains 5 PP.
Gives STEEL synergy.
Gives FLYING synergy. Gain 10% chance to dodge attacks and immunity to any BOARD_EFFECT.
Gives ROCK synergy.
Gives GROUND synergy. Increase the [LK] chance to find gold buried in the ground.
Gives FLORA synergy. Each Pokémon in shop has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with the holder.
Get the best ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF values of allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW.

At the start of the fight, holder gains either ELECTRIC_FIELD, GRASS_FIELD, PSYCHIC_FIELD or FAIRY_FIELD based on its synergies. When casting its ability, spread the field effect to all allies sharing the field's synergy.
Gives POISON synergy. Infects the holder with POKERUS, gaining 1 ATK and 10 AP every 3 seconds and transmitting to ADJACENT allies.
Restores 100% of max PP 1 second after the first ability cast.
Gives GHOST synergy. When the holder is KO, CURSE its attacker to be KO'd after 10 seconds
Gives BUG synergy but reduce the holder's max HP by 50% when cloned.
Gives MONSTER synergy. The holder gets CONFUSION for 3 seconds if gaining MONSTER stacks.
Gives AQUATIC synergy. The holder casts $t(ability.SURF) at every tidal wave, with the ability level matching current AQUATIC synergy level.
Gives GOURMET synergy. When BURN, the COOKING_POT is heated little by little which gives 10 SPEED per second.
Gives FIELD synergy. The holder gains 5 SPEED every tile they move (jumps and dashes count for one tile).
A meteorite that seems to interact with Deoxys. It continues to give off a faint glow and is slightly warm to the touch.
A catalog of devices that Rotom like. Use the catalog to have Rotom hop in and out of the various devices listed within.
A mysterious old box. When in your inventory, all $t(pkm.DITTO) found in shops are replaced by $t(pkm.MELTAN).
No effect, but can be held.
At the start of the fight, raise max HP by 200%.
After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch common and uncommon WATER Pokémon as well as $t(pkm.MAGIKARP).
After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch rare WATER Pokémon as well as $t(pkm.FEEBAS).
After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch epic WATER Pokémon as well as $t(pkm.WISHIWASHI).
Gives LIGHT synergy. A second spotlight is projected onto the holder's tile at the start of the fight.
Immediately make a Pokémon evolve. Can only be given to Pokémon that can evolve, and reduce its sell price to its previous tier.
Holder gets a bunch of stats, but can no longer evolve. Can only be given to non-fully evolved Pokémon.
Spawn 3 WILD Pokémon around the holder at the start of the fight. Rarity and tier increase with stage level.
+1% CRIT_POWER per GOLD you have. Gain 1 GOLD per KO. If eliminating the last enemy, get a Jackpot that doubles the amount gained during the round.
All the damage reduction is absorbed by the bulb. Once under 50% HP, bulb explodes, dealing all damage absorbed to ADJACENT enemy units as SPECIAL.
Gives RESURRECTION. After resurrecting, up to 3 allies KO are resurrected as well, but without items.

Starts the round by diving like a comet on an enemy at the opposite side of the board, dealing 300% ATK as SPECIAL to target and 100% ATK as SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemies, while gaining PROTECT for 2 seconds.
Each time you spend gold on a reroll, gain 1 free reroll. For every 2 shop rerolls, gain 1 SPEED and 2 SHIELD. After lots of rerolls, you may encounter powerful Pokémon in your shop.
The holder does not count for team size limit.
Counts for 3 towards RAIN. Under RAIN, your team gains +2 PP per second.
Counts for 3 towards SNOW. Under SNOW, your team recovers from FREEZE 20% faster and have [5,LK]% additional chance to FREEZE their opponents with their attacks.
Counts for 3 towards ZENITH. Under ZENITH, your Pokémon heal for 5 HP every 2 seconds and have 5% additional chance to BURN with their attacks.
Counts for 3 towards DROUGHT. Under DROUGHT, your team gains 3 ATK and takes 20% less damage from BURN.
Counts for 3 towards SANDSTORM. Under SANDSTORM, your team takes 20% less sandstorm damage and gain 1 SPEED every second.
Counts for 3 towards NIGHT. Under NIGHT, your team gains 5% CRIT_CHANCE and take 10% less critical damage.
Counts for 3 towards STORM. Under STORM, your team gains 50 SHIELD when struck by lightning and recovers from PARALYSIS 20% faster.
Counts for 3 towards WINDY. Under WINDY, your team gains 10 SPEED.
Counts for 3 towards MISTY. Under MISTY, your team gains 3 SPE_DEF.
Counts for 3 towards BLOODMOON. Under BLOODMOON, your team gets 30% of incoming healing as SHIELD when WOUND, and heal for 20% of damage dealt if target is WOUND.
Counts for 3 towards SMOG. Under SMOG, your team gains 5% accuracy and has 15% less chance to get POISONNED.
Counts for 3 towards MURKY. Under MURKY, your team gains 10 LUCK and -10% negative status duration, and resist to CURSE 1 second longer.
+1 to NORMAL synergy
+1 to GRASS synergy
+1 to FIRE synergy
+1 to WATER synergy
+1 to ELECTRIC synergy
+1 to FIGHTING synergy
+1 to PSYCHIC synergy
+1 to DARK synergy
+1 to STEEL synergy
+1 to GROUND synergy
+1 to POISON synergy
+1 to DRAGON synergy
+1 to FIELD synergy
+1 to MONSTER synergy
+1 to HUMAN synergy
+1 to AQUATIC synergy
+1 to BUG synergy
+1 to FLYING synergy
+1 to FLORA synergy
+1 to ROCK synergy
+1 to GHOST synergy
+1 to FAIRY synergy
+1 to ICE synergy
+1 to FOSSIL synergy
+1 to SOUND synergy
+1 to ARTIFICIAL synergy
+1 to LIGHT synergy
+1 to WILD synergy
+1 to AMORPHOUS synergy
+1 to GOURMET synergy
Sacrifice 3 player HP to give permanently +3 ATK and +3 SPEED to a FIRE Pokémon. Immediately consumed when given.

Each cell battery on bench gives 2 SPEED to all your ELECTRIC Pokémon.
Use it on an ELECTRIC Pokémon to supercharge it for the next fight, granting it 20 SPEED, 30 SHIELD and ELECTRIC_FIELD.
This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the FLORA type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the AQUATIC type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the ROCK type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the FIRE type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
Contains cells of the Order Pokémon, Zygarde. It will cause a transformation into one of its alternate formes.

The holder will cook their Signature Dish between rounds.
Immediately consumed when given. Give a SANDWICH to the holder and all ADJACENT allies. SANDWICH gives stat boosts for the next fight based on the types of the Pokémon eating it.
Gives various stat boosts for the next fight based on the types of the Pokémon eating it.
At the start of next fight, raise max HP by 30%. If fed to a Pokémon holding COOKING_POT, the Pokémon is BURN for 5 seconds.
Gain 10 ATK at the start of the next fight.
Gain 80 PP at the start of the next fight.
Start the next fight RAGE for 4 seconds.
The first attack in the next fight will inflict FREEZE for 5 seconds on hit.
The first attack in the next fight will inflict CHARM for 5 seconds on hit.
Gain 100 SHIELD at the start of the next fight and every time a berry is consumed.
In the next fight, each attack by this Pokémon will remove 2 DEF from the target. Will turn into a SWEET_APPLE after one round.
In the next fight, each attack by this Pokémon will remove 2 SPE_DEF from the target. Will turn into a SIRUPY_APPLE after one round.
In the next fight, each attack by this Pokémon has [30,LK]% chance to inflict PARALYSIS for 1 second. Will turn into LEFTOVERS after one round.

Gain a field effect based on its flavor. The flavor will be determined by the type of the Pokémon eating it:
FAIRY: HERBA_MYSTICA_SWEET
GRASS: HERBA_MYSTICA_BITTER
ELECTRIC: HERBA_MYSTICA_SOUR
PSYCHIC: HERBA_MYSTICA_SPICY
Others: HERBA_MYSTICA_SALTY
Get GRASS_FIELD during the next fight
Get RUNE_PROTECT during the next fight
Get FAIRY_FIELD during the next fight
Get PSYCHIC_FIELD during the next fight
Get ELECTRIC_FIELD during the next fight
Gain 20% dodge chance in the next fight.
A mix of mushrooms that can be sold for GOLD when coming back to town
Gives 40 SPEED and reduce max HP by 20% for the next fight when consumed. Will be sold for 1 GOLD when returning to town.
Gives +30% max HP for the next fight when consumed. Will be sold for 2 GOLD when returning to town.
When consumed, gains RUNE_PROTECT, 40 SPEED and heals 10% of max HP per second for the next fight. Will be sold for 5 GOLD when returning to town.
Gain 15 permanent max HP.
Get 3 random berries
Each Pokémon in the next shop rerolls this round has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with a Pokémon eating HONEY.
Gain 100 SHIELD. All held berries are added to the poffin. Their effects are applied immediately, with healed HP turned into SHIELD.
Start the next fight with RUNE_PROTECT for 10 seconds and 20% of max HP as SHIELD.
Start the next fight with +50% base ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF.
No effect. There is not much left to eat.
POISONNED the Pokémon that eats it. If it has POISON type, restore 5% of max HP every 2 seconds instead.
The first attack in the next fight will cause POSSESSED for 5 seconds on hit.
Gain 50 SPEED in the next fight.
Gain 50% CRIT_CHANCE and allow ability to critically strike in the next fight. If the ability can already critically strike by default, increase CRIT_POWER by 50% instead.
Gain 100% CRIT_POWER and allow ability to critically strike in the next fight. If the ability can already critically strike by default, increase CRIT_POWER by 50% instead.
A cocktail with [LK] random effects that can buff stats or make you dizzy.
Permanently lose 5 max HP to gain 5 ATK and 10 AP.
A random candy granting a permanent stats bonus
Gain 3 permanent SPE_DEF
Gain 10 permanent AP
Gain 5 permanent SPEED
Gain 10 permanent LUCK
Gain 15 permanent HP
Gain 3 permanent DEF
Gain 3 permanent ATK
Baked with FIGHTING HUMAN STEEL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RUBY). $t(passive_description.RUBY_CREAM)
Baked with GRASS FLORA POISON GHOST allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_MATCHA). $t(passive_description.MATCHA_CREAM)
Baked with WATER AQUATIC ICE allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_MINT). $t(passive_description.MINT_CREAM)
Baked with ROCK GROUND FOSSIL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_SALTED). $t(passive_description.SALTED_CREAM)
Baked with DARK MONSTER DRAGON allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_CARAMEL_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.CARAMEL_SWIRL_CREAM)
Baked with FIRE WILD FIELD allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RUBY_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.RUBY_SWIRL_CREAM)
Baked with ELECTRIC BUG FAIRY SOUND allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_LEMON). $t(passive_description.LEMON_CREAM)
Baked with PSYCHIC AMORPHOUS BABY LIGHT allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RAINBOW_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.RAINBOW_SWIRL_CREAM)
Baked with NORMAL FLYING ARTIFICIAL GOURMET allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_VANILLA). $t(passive_description.VANILLA_CREAM)
An Egg sold at Chansey's Daycare

+1 GOLD each time the holder knocks out an opponent.
Reduce max interest cap by 10 GOLD.

+3 GOLD when obtained.
Increase max interest cap by 10 GOLD.
An old rusty coin. +1 GOLD when obtained.
A small gold nugget. +3 GOLD when obtained.
A big gold nugget. +10 GOLD when obtained.
Exchange an item component or a crafted item on bench for another random one. Single use.
Recycle a crafted item on bench or the crafted items held by a Pokémon into their base components. Single use.
You wonder what's inside. It will open once you have 40 HP or less.
A peculiar set of armor that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. Auspicious wishes live within it.
A peculiar set of armor that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. Malicious will lurks within it.
It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. Gives the holder +50% base ATK. Transfers to the ally with the weakest ATK when the holder faints.
Written upon it are the true secrets of the path of water. When used on a $t(pkm.KUBFU), will cause it to evolve into $t(pkm.URSHIFU_RAPID).
Written upon it are the true secrets of the path of darkness. When used on a $t(pkm.KUBFU), will cause it to evolve into $t(pkm.URSHIFU_SINGLE)
Use it on a flower pot to evolve the Pokémon inside, or on a berry tree to fully grow it.
Use it on a flower pot to permanently give 50 max HP and 30 AP to the Pokémon inside, or on a berry tree to fully grow it and make it golden.
Use it on a Pokémon to send them to the Dojo for 3 stages, returning with +50 max HP, +5 ATK and +15 AP. A substitute takes their place in the meantime.
Use it on a Pokémon to send them to the Dojo for 4 stages, returning with +100 max HP, +10 ATK and +30 AP. A substitute takes their place in the meantime.
Use it on a Pokémon to send them to the Dojo for 5 stages, returning with +150 max HP, +15 ATK and +45 AP. A substitute takes their place in the meantime.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get a previously used type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get FIRE type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get FOSSIL type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get PSYCHIC type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get WATER type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get ELECTRIC type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get FAIRY type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get DARK type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get GRASS type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get ICE type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get FIGHTING type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get POISON type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get SOUND type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get STEEL type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get FLYING type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get ROCK type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get GROUND type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get FIELD type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get GHOST type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get LIGHT type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get NORMAL type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get BUG type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get GOURMET type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get MONSTER type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get AQUATIC type.
Can be equipped on $t(pkm.SILVALLY) to get DRAGON type.

Complete this mission to earn 30 GOLD:
 reach level 9

Complete this mission to earn 30 GOLD:
 inflict 100 damage to other players

Complete this mission to earn 30 GOLD:
 reach 8 different active synergies

Complete this mission to earn 30 GOLD:
 earn 200 GOLD in total during the game

Complete this mission to earn 30 GOLD:
 get 5 STAR STAR STAR Pokémon on board
When another player beats you in battle, they get an additional 4 GOLD and take the LEADERS_CREST.
Combine it with other item components to make all kinds of scarves, bands and bows. Those items will be removed if you lower down NORMAL synergy level.
The holder gains the NORMAL type.
Critical attacks provide 33% of the damage dealt as SHIELD.
Every 3 seconds, gain 20 SPEED.
The first time user shield is depleted, this item explodes, dealing 50% of all SHIELD gained so far as SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemies.
Stat debuffs inflicted by enemies become buffs instead. Holder stat buffs cannot be stolen.
Increase all stat buffs received by 25%. Allows the wearer to eat 2 different dishes per round.
Increase holder's LUCK by 30%
If an ADJACENT ally is about to get KO with some incoming damage, the wearer takes the damage instead.
The holder and allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW have their max PP reduced by 15%.
Holder can no longer cast its ability. AP is converted to SHIELD, and PP are converted to bonus SPECIAL on next attack.

Wanted: Fainted or Alive
 Reward: 10 GOLD
